entry.title: Volkswagen
entry.content: The world renowned car manufacturer. I have worked on their new platform due to launch in the second half of 2011, both from Berlin and their head office in Wollfsburg.

entry.title: Arquiva
entry.content: Australian owned telecom company which runs Freeview and the SeeSaw video on demand business, for which I did front end development work.

entry.title: Children's Workforce Development Council
entry.content: A UK non-departmental public body. I did templating work for a training and assessment extranet powered in Drupal.

entry.title: Logica
entry.content: Developed some JQuery widgets for their intranet, and worked on site to help with the integration.

entry.title: E.ON
entry.content: Energy company based in Germany whose acquisitions include the UK's Powergen. Worked on some medium large projects while at Grand Union.
